step4.title: Let us show you a demo
step4.subtitle: Here you'll see how to import an official credential into the digital wallet.
step4.intro: Imagine you're Laura: she needs to import her credential from the Madrid Medical Association to use her digital identity.
bullets: It's like adding a secure digital card to your wallet, with verifiable information such as your profession.
Next, we’ll walk you through the process – it’s very simple.
step4.cta: Got it, I have my credential
